Articles.Content:
This post is actually to test my account and make sure it actually works correctly. My activation email gave me a strange message upon clicking the link, "Your account has already been activated, please try signing in." I actually wanted to post something on a dev blog but couldn't figure out how to do it and thus this seems like the best place to test this out.

However, despite my nefarious plan I am also new to this game and community. Therefore I'd also like to use this post to say, "Hello, community." I probably will not be terribly active in the forums, but you can bet I'm probably reading and trying to study the information that has been amassed here. I'm not terribly good at the game, I have this habit of building six stage rockets that weigh too much and take FAR too much effort to go into space. I've started taking notes and trying to apply those numbers to build more efficient rockets, and so far no real results have been yielded. I'll keep working on it, and perhaps once I can these behemoths into orbit without using all their fuel, I'll work on the next challenge ... the Mun!
